title: contemporary serif font for a beauty center
content:
Can you help me to make a good selection?  
I would like to hear some suggestions.  
Thanks in advance for your time
author: slokai

comments.content: While FF Pitu may have its merits, and it is contemporary, I can’t help feel that if used for a beauty center, it would scream Botox and scalpels. Then again, maybe that would perfectly communicate a beauty center these days

thank you for your comments.  
If there is someone with more suggestions will be welcome

I really like Feel Script. Check out: [http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000300](http://web.archive.org/web/20090630101142/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000300 "http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000300").

Not sure if you want this for the logo, headlines, or text.  
Anyway, [Perla](http://web.archive.org/web/20090630101142/http:/www.identifont.com/show?2D2) is a “modern” didone, always a good choice for fashion/beauty, with some interesting unicase alternates.

Thank you nick,  
I’m starting with the project. They have only a logo for now. Any font-suggestion for headlines and/or text is welcome. My first idea was using a “clean” sans but I think it needs more personality. Thanks again

[http://www.signographie.de/cms/front\_content.php?idart=194](http://web.archive.org/web/20090630101142/http:/www.signographie.de/cms/front_content.php?idart=194 "http://www.signographie.de/cms/front\_content.php?idart=194")

Have a look at the Italic as well.

[http://www.signographie.de/cms/front\_content.php?idart=194](http://web.archive.org/web/20090630101142/http:/www.signographie.de/cms/front_content.php?idart=194 "http://www.signographie.de/cms/front\_content.php?idart=194")

Have a look at the Italic as well.
